title: The Birth of Samuel
summary: 1 Samuel 1 introduces Hannah, a barren woman who prays earnestly for a child. God hears her prayer, and she gives birth to Samuel. In gratitude, she dedicates him to serve the Lord at the tabernacle.

faq.question: What did Hannah do with Samuel after he was born?
faq.answer: She dedicated him to the Lord and brought him to live at the tabernacle with Eli.
